original_text: These words made the leaders of the meeting place feel ashamed. But the other people there were very happy. They were happy because they had seen Jesus do many good and powerful things.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 말씀을 하시매 모든 반대하는 자들은 부끄러워하고 온 무리는 그가 하시는 모든 영광스러운 일을 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: These words made the leaders of the meeting place feel ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 이 말들은 회당 지도자들을 부끄럽게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: But the other people there were very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그곳의 다른 사람들은 매우 기뻤다

sentences.original_text: They were happy because they had seen Jesus
do many good and powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 선하고 강력한 일들을 행하시는 것을
